thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Paul J D

author: Paul J D
title: Paul J D
text: Had a leaking shower bar, found the Shower Doctor whilst looking up replacement showers, Shower doctor said I needed a new flow valve, I ordered one from them - it arrived very quickly, shower problem cured! Saved almost Â£150 on the cost of a new replacement shower I would recommend them to anybody thanks Shower Doctor Paul
